snippet: The police identified the man as Majid Muhamad, 45, who served 10 years in an Italian prison on terrorism charges, and who was released a year ago.
abstract: Italian police arrest Majid Muhamad, Iraqi man who had been affiliated with radical group Ansar al-Islam and served 10 years in prison for terrorism charges; Muhamad is suspected of helping foreigners pass illegally through country.
lead_paragraph: The police identified the man as Majid Muhamad, 45, who served 10 years in an Italian prison on terrorism charges, and who was released a year ago.

headline.main: Italy: Iraqi With Terrorism Ties Is Arrested in Illegal Migration Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Iraqi With Terrorism Ties Is Arrested in Illegal Migration Case
